item.title: Tabs
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1493708933168{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Tabs

A total of 10 finely designed styles are supported by tabs function of the plugin. The count would be 20 styles if you consider the dark versions.There is simply no another plugin or theme that supports so many elegant styles for tabs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

TabHighlights

  • Tabs can be of two types vertical and regular horizontal style tabs.
  • The tabs are designed to work well in all device resolutions without sacrificing usability. The responsive mode of the tab can be triggered at certain mobile resolution. This mobile resolution value can be customized by the user.
  • For styles that support icons, choice of displaying a font icon or an icon image along with the tab title is supported.
  • Dark version is supported for all 10 styles of tabs for use in dark backgrounds.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132563457{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="55" tablet_width="1110" tablet_spacing="25" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="5"][lvca_tabs mobile_width="600"][lvca_tab tab_id="tab-59786c17e74ea" tab_title="Description"]

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493648276531{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Services

Many agencies, freelancers, corporates, products/apps require capturing the services provided by the agency or the features of a product. The services addonis designed to help users capture these services or features in a multi-column grid.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132563457{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Feature Highlights

  • The addon element supports about 3 different styles (with 2 additional styles in premium versionof the plugin).
  • Each of the service requires you to input a title for the service/feature and a short description of the service offered or the product feature. Additionally, each service allows you to enter a font icon or an icon image file to represent that service.
  • Includes a dark version if you prefer to display the serviceswith dark backgrounds. The dark versioncan also be used to capture serviceson image backgrounds.

item.title: Team Member Profiles
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493647756551{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Team Profiles

The team member profiles addon element provides an easy way to capture the team members of your organization or an agency in a multi-column grid.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132584270{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Feature Highlights

  • The details captured include team member name, position, a short description and the email plus social profile of the individual team members.
  • Capturing team members is as easy as inputting multiple child elements for the team members that are part of the organization.
  • Two different styles of presenting the team members is provided with more planned in premium plugin.
  • The option to specify the number of columns is provided that helps to control the number of team members displayed per row of the team members.

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1454132665797{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Testimonials

Capture testimonials from your customers or clients to help increase conversion. You can provide customer/client name, position and their company website in the addon options.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Usage Highlights

  • The addon can be used forcapturing testimonials received for your product or business or services. Most agencies, corporates, small businesses, freelancers and products/apps require testimonials to displayed prominently on the site to help convert visitors to customers.
  • The testimonials information include details about the person/company endorsing the product/service; details like name, company, website of this person/organization along with an image representing this person/entity.
  • Displays multiple testimonials in a row with the user having the option to specify the number of items per row. This is useful if you need a large number of testimonials to be visible instantly when the user scrolls down to view the testimonials section.
  • Includes a dark version if you prefer to display the testimonials with dark backgrounds.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1453809761780{background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="55" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="25" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="15"][lvca_testimonials per_line="3"][lvca_testimonial animation="slideInLeft" author="John Ruben" credentials="COO, Victor Partners" author_image="12435"]Praesent vestibulum dapibus nibh. item.title: Testimonial Slider
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493646356178{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Testimonials Slider

Capture testimonials from your customers/clients/employees in popular slider format.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132688854{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1493646379075{background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}" el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Many Slider Options

  • The addon provides large number of options to customize the slider to control navigation, animation speed, delay between slides, pause on hover/action etc.
  • Includes a dark version if you prefer to display the testimonials with dark backgrounds. You can also use the same to capture testimonials on image backgrounds.

item.title: Progress Bars
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493645423527{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Progress Bars

The plugin features a number of elements that help display statistical information in the form of odometers, piecharts and stats bars.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Usage Highlights

  • The addonis designed to animate the display of the statistical information or numbers when the users scroll down to the section containing the addon element.
  • The animation starts from the start value to the end value customizable by the user in the addon options window.
  • A progress bar can be used to display how far along we are in a process. The highlighted bar represents the percentage value of the progress made by your business/organization.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132651203{padding-top: 55px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-color: #ffffff [vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493644891800{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Piecharts

The plugin features a number of elements that help display statistical information in the form of odometers, piecharts and stats bars.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

  • The elements are designed animate the display of the statistical information or numbers when the users scroll down to the section containing the element.

  • Piecharts are best suited to displaypercentage data. The highlighted bar represents the percentage value.

item.title: Odometer Counters
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493646110459{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Odometer Counters

This element displays one or more animated odometer or counter statistics in a multi-column grid. Very useful to capture numbers related to your business like customerssigned up, products released, hours worked, download count etc.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Usage Highlights

  • The elements are designed animate the display of the statistical information or numbers when the users scroll down to the section containing the element.
  • The element animates from the start value to the end value when the user scrolls down to the section. You can control the number of such odometers displayed per row.
  • Each counter statistic requires a start and an end value with a title and icon providing the information about what the number represents like a download number or number of products sold or customers gained.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132637774{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="55" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="25" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="5"][lvca_odometers per_line="4"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="App Downloads" start_value="1000" stop_value="26492" icon_image="57"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="Coffees Consumed" start_value="80" stop_value="613" icon_image="58"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="Wide Grip Pushups" start_value="10" stop_value="1277" icon_image="59"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="Hours Worked" start_value="0" stop_value="458" icon_image="60"][/lvca_odometers][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="35" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="15" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" lvca_dark_bg="true" css=".vc_custom_1453744315318{background-color: #1b1b1c !important;}"][vc_column][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="35" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="15" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="0"][lvca_odometers per_line="4"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="App Downloads" start_value="1000" stop_value="26492" icon_image="57"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="Coffees Consumed" start_value="80" stop_value="613" icon_image="58"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="Wide Grip Pushups" start_value="10" stop_value="1277" icon_image="59"][lvca_odometer_item icon_type="icon_image" stats_title="Hours Worked" start_value="0" stop_value="458" icon_image="60"][/lvca_odometers][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="35" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="15" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Portfolio Grid
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1453727329640{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Portfolio Grid

Helps you build a multi-column grid of portfolio custom post types. The portfolio items displayed are filterable by taxonomy terms.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132744314{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Usage Highlights

  • Using the Grid element, you can construct a portfolio of your work/services/products. We recommend you use the popular portfolio plugin for building a collection of portfolio entries.
  • The premium version of the plugin has support for pagination, lazy load with load more button and lightbox option for images. The additional posts are loaded via AJAX when the user navigates through the pages populated or when the user hits the Load More button.
[/vc_column_text][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="55" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="35" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="15"][lvca_portfolio posts_query="size:6|order_by:date|post_type:portfolio" image_linkable="true" taxonomy_filter="portfolio_category" display_title="true" display_summary="true" filterable="true" per_line="3" gutter="20" tablet_gutter="10" tablet_width="800" mobile_gutter="10" mobile_width="480" heading="The Portfolio"][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="70" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="50" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="20"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1453727329640{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

item.title: Pricing Table
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493642503983{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}" el_class="lvca-widget-header"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Pricing Table

The pricing plans offered by your business can be captured with pricing plan element. The pricing plans are displayed in a multi-column grid.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132824378{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Feature Highlights

  • The addon element provides ability to highlight a specific plan.
  • Custom Animations for each pricing plan (premium version only).
  • Option to specify the number of pricing plans to be shown per row of the pricing table.

item.title: Buttons
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1492244850856{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation="bounceIn" el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Buttons - Pro!

The plugin lets you create buttons of multiple colors that you would use in your site. The supported colors are Orange, Blue, Teal, Cyan, Green, Pink, Black, Red, Transparent and Semi Transparent (for dark backgrounds).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Addon Features

  • You can choose a custom color and custom hover color too for the button to create a button of your chosen color.
  • A button of Default color has its color derived from the Theme Color set in the plugin options.
  • You can choose to display an icon along with the button text. The icon can be a icon font or an image.
  • Choose from over 30 animations to create an animated button.

item.title: Gallery Carousel
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1493640531935{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Image/Video Carousel - Pro!

Create a carousel of images/videos (or a combination of both) for showcasing your work or video content uploaded to Vimeo/YouTube. The videos can be played with a single click of the play button on the gallery item[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Usage Examples

  • An instance of this element can capture a portfolio of work like that of a photographer or graphic designer/artist.
  • It can be used to create a carousel of videos uploaded to YouTube/Vimeo useful for video bloggers, video tutorial sites, video marketers, small businesses or websites with a major presence on YouTube/Vimeo.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1492244850856{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

item.title: Icon Lists
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1492244850856{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Icon Lists - Pro!

Create a list of icons with optional links to sites or pages that the icons represent. The tooltip text provides a short hint or description of what the icon item represents.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Usage Examples

  • Examples include social media profiles, icon lists representing payment options or download platforms.
  • Can be used to represent the a list of features with small sized screenshots for each feature. The tooltip text provides the description of the feature.
  • This addon can even be used to provide aquick summary of services with tooltip text providing short description of the service.

item.title: Video Gallery
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1492244850856{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Video Gallery - Pro!

Showcase a collection of YouTube or Vimeo videos using the video gallery addon element. Quite handy for video tutorial sites, video bloggers, or any studio with substantial amount of video content.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Video Gallery Features

  • The video opens up in a popup window when the play on the placeholder image is clicked.
  • This addon is part of the Premium version of the plugin and provides advanced features like pagination and lazy load through a load more button.
  • It can be used to create a gallery of videos uploaded to YouTube/Vimeo useful for video bloggers, video tutorial sites, video marketers, small businesses or websites with a major presence on YouTube/Vimeo.

item.title: Sliders
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1493635429023{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Image Slider - Pro!

Create a responsive slider of images with extensive options to customize the function and presentation of the slider. Comes with choice of Nivo, Flex, Slick and lightweight Responsive sliders.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1492244850856{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Flex Slider

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="55" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="35" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="20"][lvca_image_slider direction_nav="true" control_nav="true" pause_on_hover="true" pause_on_action="true" loop="true" slideshow="true" slideshow_speed="5000" animation_speed="600"][lvca_image_slide button_color="orange" new_window="true" rounded="true" title="Slide 1" image="12630" slide_url="http://example.com" heading="Suspendisse nisl elit rhoncus eget" subheading="Aenean massa" button_text="Purchase Now" button_url="http://example.com"][lvca_image_slide button_color="teal" new_window="true" title="Slide 1" image="12634" slide_url="http://example.com" heading="Donec mi odio faucibus at" subheading="Fusce convallis" button_text="Know More" button_url="http://example.com"][lvca_image_slide rounded="true" title="Slide 1" image="12637" slide_url="http://example.com" heading="Quisque libero metus condimentum" subheading="Pellentesque dapibus" button_text="Contact Us" button_url="http://example.com"][/lvca_image_slider][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="90" tablet_width="960" tablet_spacing="70" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="40"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1492244850856{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Nivo Slider

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Many Slider Options

  • The slider can be used anywhere on a page and can also function as the main slider of the page displayed at the top of the page.
  • Allslider types support multitude of options but for most users, the default options provided should suffice.

item.title: Posts Block
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1493633378276{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Posts Block - Pro!

The premium version of the plugin now comes bundled with versatile posts block module.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

Advanced Features

  • 13 different styles to present your blog posts or any custom post type and 5 different styles for the header. The preview for most styles is presented below.
  • Advanced AJAX based category or custom taxonomy filters. The filter list is super responsive - changes from horizontal to dropdown list as the device width is reduced.
  • AJAX pagination support with ability to seamlessly handle large number of pages.
  • Load more and Next Prev navigation available as other modes for AJAX based posts navigation.
  • Built-in cache for performance of filtering, pagination, load more.
  • Help users navigate the entire collection of blog posts or custom post types and their categories without reloading the page.
  • Large number of customization options - decide on what you want user to see and how you want it to be presented.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1507013628178{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

item.title: Tabs
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1493708933168{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-header"]

Tabs

A total of 10 finely designed styles are supported by tabs function of the plugin. The count would be 20 styles if you consider the dark versions.There is simply no another plugin or theme that supports so many elegant styles for tabs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="lvca-widget-details"]

TabHighlights

  • Tabs can be of two types vertical and regular horizontal style tabs.
  • The tabs are designed to work well in all device resolutions without sacrificing usability. The responsive mode of the tab can be triggered at certain mobile resolution. This mobile resolution value can be customized by the user.
  • For styles that support icons, choice of displaying a font icon or an icon image along with the tab title is supported.
  • Dark version is supported for all 10 styles of tabs for use in dark backgrounds.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454132563457{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][lvca_spacer desktop_spacing="55" tablet_width="1110" tablet_spacing="25" mobile_width="480" mobile_spacing="5"][lvca_tabs mobile_width="600"][lvca_tab tab_id="tab-59786c17e74ea" tab_title="Description"]

item.title: Walking on Beach
item.dc:creator: livemesh
item.content:encoded:
Vestibulum rutrum, mi nec elementum vehicula, eros quam gravida nisl, id fringilla neque ante vel mi. Suspendisse pulvinar, augue ac venenatis condimentum, sem libero volutpat nibh, nec pellentesque velit pede quis nunc. Phasellus leo dolor, tempus non, auctor et, hendrerit quis, nisi. Quisque id odio. Vivamus consectetuer hendrerit lacus.
Quisque rutrum.
